## Context.add() method

Add a binding to the context. If a locked binding already exists with the same key, an error will be thrown.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(binding: Binding<unknown>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  binding | <code>Binding&lt;unknown&gt;</code> | The configured binding to be added |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
